text: kisee purush jise allaah ne pustak, nirnay shakti aur nubuvvat dee ho, usake lie yogy nahin ki logon se kahe ki allaah ko chhodakar mere daas ban jao[1], apitu (vah to yahee kahega ki) tum allaah vaale ban jao. is kaaran ki tum pustak kee shiksha dete ho tatha is kaaran ki usaka adhyayan svayan bhee karate rahate ho
